sections.name: about
sections.sub_text: The man, the myth, the designer
body_text: I'm Joe, I'm a freelance UI designer based in Blackpool up on the North west coast of the UK.
For over a decade I have been crafting modern, usable interfaces for the web and mobile apps with clients around the world.

I love creating designs for startups and businesses with a genuine passion for their digital products and services, companies who value design and how it solves business problems with good user experience.
I am currently taking on new UI design projects. If you're in need of a design solution for your business, let’s chat.
Still want to know more about me and find out what makes me tick? Here’s a more detailed look into me.
